item.title: Meat Monday is Back! | June 9
item.description: Join the CCPD & MANE for a sizzling summer kickoff! | Date: June 9, 2025 | Time: 11:30 AM – 2 PM | Location: DCC Courtyard. Enjoy delicious grilled meats alongside a variety of gluten-free, dairy-free, and vegan sides—plus a tasty meat substitute option for our plant-based friends! Come hungry and bring your friends—there’s something for everyone!

item.title: Kevin Smith Retiring
item.description: Kevin Smith, who has served Rensselaer with distinction for the past 41 years, will be retiring on June 20, 2025. Throughout his remarkable career, Kevin has played a vital role in developing, managing, and maintaining the university’s comprehensive space inventory system — a task that involves overseeing over 4.7 million gross square feet of floor space across our Troy campus. With a deep knowledge of our facilities and a steadfast commitment to accuracy and detail, he has helped ensure that…

item.title: The Folsom Library elevator will be out of service from May 27 to August 22 for a planned system upgrade.
item.description: The Folsom Library elevator will be out of service from May 27 to August 22 for a planned system upgrade. We apologize for any difficulty this causes. Please plan accordingly, and do not hesitate to ask at the Service Desk if you need assistance or require accommodations.
